We are very grateful to the European Olympic family for the decision to hold the first European Games in Azerbaijan.
One of the reasons for the decision to hold these Games in Baku is the achievements of our athletes.
During the years of independence, Azerbaijan has recognized itself as a country selected by sport traditions.
Another reason is related to the rapid development of Azerbaijan. During the last decade, our economy has grown more than three times.
These Games have enabled us to realize projects that are already in place in a shorter timeframe.
The standards of the European Games will be determined in Baku at a certain extent.
After the European Games, we will host the World Chess Olympiad in 2016 and at the same time for the first time (cont) http://t.co/1nMHUMqEe6
We will hold the Islamic Solidarity Games in 2017. These games bring together the Muslim world. It has a very symbolic meaning.
We hope the European Games will be friendly, partnership games.
Economically 85 percent of the Azerbaijani economy is formed by the private sector.
The policy of diversifying the economy is being successfully implemented.
The dependence on oil prices is gradually diminishing. Most of our economy is provided by the non-energy sector.
Gas will be transported from Azerbaijan to Europe through the Southern Gas Corridor.
This may be one of Europe's largest infrastructure projects.
Our energy and transportation projects are aimed at broader international and regional cooperation so that every country can benefit from it.
We have been suffering from the occupation of Armenia for more than 20 years.
All conflicts in the world should be considered from the same perspective, and the same approach should apply the same international law.
International law norms should not be interpreted in the interests of some countries. They should be interpreted as written.
In society, it is necessary to create an environment where the basis for threats is minimal.
In this case, mainly economic development, unemployment and poverty reduction, good governance and social justice are envisaged.
All this has always been a key factor for us.
Today, apparent threats to terrorism are largely due to low levels of education.
We have invested heavily in education. At present, literacy rate in Azerbaijan is one hundred percent.
Our states are an example of a modern and secular Muslim country.
This shows that in a Muslim country there is a modern, secular society that respects traditional religions.
To be as close as possible to the European Union does not mean for us not only to market and technology, (cont) http://t.co/Knz5hGDbh7
Baku-Tbilisi-Kars railway will connect the continents. Everybody will benefit from this project - Russia, China, (cont) http://t.co/ggTJYTnSGn

The million jobs, Family Ethical Income, employment subsidy for women and young people and increase in sub-school and scholarships explain this great achievement
The goal for this decade is to make Chile a developed country without poverty, in which everyone has a decent life and opportunities to develop their talents

It was with great sadness that he learned of the death of the doctor Aloysio Campos da Paz Júnior, founder of Rede Sarah
Campos de Paz said that his philosophy was to work for each patient to be treated based on their potential and not on their difficulties
... It was with this faith in the potential of each patient that the Sarah Network helped to improve the quality of life of thousands of Brazilians
Elections in Greece #: I greet the dazzling victory of the left and congratulate #Syriza
The Greeks have widely favored the left and have declared their willingness to break with austerity policies # Greece #Syriza
The vote in # Greece is a strong signal to Europe, which must turn the page of socially and economically unsustainable reforms
It is urgent to restore confidence to Europeans & to implement policies for a Europe + solidarity + social # Greece
